definition[0]: someone who goes ahead of a group and finds the best way through unknown land
definition[1]: a person who discovers new ways of doing things
definition[2]: a US government space programme in which NASA sent a spacecraft without people inside to Mars in 1997 in order to find out more information about the planet
definition[3]: a person or company that discovers a new way of doing something
example[0]: The company is a pathfinder in terms of e-commerce.
